mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Point(point_id, user_id, review_id, type, point, comment) VALUES(#{pointId}, #{userId}, #{reviewId}, #{type}, #{point}, #{comment} );
mapper.select: SELECT point_id pointId, review_id reviewId, user_id userId, type, comment, point, inserted FROM Point WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY point_id ORDER BY inserted DESC
